Packages that use com.sun.jini.phoenix
com.sun.jini.phoenix A configurable Java(TM) Remote Method Invocation (Java RMI) activation system daemon implementation.  
 

Classes in com.sun.jini.phoenix used by com.sun.jini.phoenix
GroupPolicy
          Interface for policy objects to control what ActivationGroupDesc instances can be used.
SunJrmpExporter
          JRMP exporter to export an object using a well-known object identifier.
